entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as wearing a quilted, purple dressing gown and pulling out her wand to make breakfast.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as entering the room and having breakfast with Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as yawning and talking to Harry about Scrimgeour.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as being asked funny questions by Kingsley and Tonks.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as being asked funny questions by Scrimgeour along with Tonks.

relationships.description: Tonks and Kingsley are being asked funny questions by Scrimgeour.
Kingsley is also being asked funny questions by Scrimgeour.
